t: How to Sell on Amazon Handmade in 2023
s: August 14, 2023 - Artisans who sell on Amazon Handmade can create a customized storefront that reflects their brand identity, story, and techniques to craft their products. This personal touch adds a layer of connection between the artisan and the customer, enhancing the overall shopping experience.

t: The Problem with Selling on Handmade at Amazon
s: January 21, 2020 - NOTE: This article was originally published in 2016. The information presented was accurate at that time, but both Etsy and Amazon fee structures have changed over time. What hasn’t changed during that timeframe? My opinion that artisan and luxury brands are best served by avoiding Amazon.

t: Sell on Amazon Handmade | Apply now to join our maker-only community of sellers
s: Amazon uses an application process to add new makers to the Handmade category to ensure customers are able to buy with confidence. How do your fees work? Joining Handmade, creating your shop, and listing products is free. When you make a sale, Handmade will deduct a 15% referral fee.

s: January 10, 2020 - URL - your artisan profile URL ... your brand name initially. Still, you can click the lock icon here to change it.
